alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marshall, northwestern Woodford, north central Tazewell and northeastern Peoria Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peoria, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Washington and Germantown Hills around 250 PM CDT. Spring Bay and Bay View Gardens around 255 PM CDT. Metamora and Rome around 300 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chillicothe, Lacon, Washburn and Sparland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 between mile markers 0 and 4, and between mile markers 12 and 14. Interstate 74 between mile markers 86 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
